question_option_freetext_placeholder: Can you write your reason here?
login_title: Sign in to your OVON account
error_login_credentials: Please, enter a valid email and password. Remember that fields are case sensitive.
text_account_verified: We have verified your account, now you can log in
error_account_activation: We weren't able to activate your account, you can <1>click here</1> to resend the activation email.
error_passowrd_change: There was an error, check that both passwords match and that they have a minimum length of 8 characters.
text_password_changed: We have changed your password, you can log in with your new credentials
error_registration: There was an error, please verify all the fields are correct
text_verification_email_sent: We just sent you a confirmation email, please check your inbox out and follow the instructions to continue.
text_register: Please, fill in this form to register a new account
text_resend_email: Enter the email you registered with:
text_resend_email_done: We've sent a confirmation email to verify your account
text_reset_password: Enter the email you registered with and you will receive instructions to reset your password
error_reset_password: There was an error, please introduce the email you registered with
text_reset_password_sent: We've sent you an email with instructions to reset your password
text_confirm_password_reset: Enter a new password, remember it must be at least 8 characters, make it difficult to steal
error_confirm_password_reset: There was an error changing your password, make sure it has at least 8 characters and both fields match
text_confirm_password_reset_done: We've changed your password, now you can log in with your new credentials
modal_confirm_delete_questionnaire: Are you sure? This action cannot be undone
modal_new_questionnaire: Choose a name so you can track it later
general_error: Sorry, there was an unexpected error
cookies_consent_body: This website uses cookies only for basic app functionality
